description:
Hook for PyInquirer `editor` type prompts. Opens an editor like nano to fill in a
 field. [Source example](https://github.com/kazhala/InquirerPy/blob/master/examples/editor.py)

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

message.description: String message to show when prompting.
message.title: Message

title: InquirerEditorHook

description:
Hook for PyInquirer 'list' type prompts, a single selector that returns a string.
 Takes in two forms of `choices` inputs, list of string or list of maps with the
 key as the question and the value as the output.
 [Source example](https://github.com/kazhala/InquirerPy/blob/master/examples/list.py)

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

message.description: String message to show when prompting.
message.title: Message

choices.description: List of strings or dicts with keys as output and values as display.
choices.title: Choices

index.description: Boolean to return the index instead of the answer
index.title: Index

title: InquirerConfirmHook

description:
Hook for PyInquirer `checkbox` type prompts. Allows the user to multi-select from a
 list of choices and outputs a list. Takes in three forms of `choices` inputs. A
 list of string, a list of maps with all keys having a `name` field per the original
 [spec](https://github.com/kazhala/InquirerPy/blob/master/examples/checkbox.py), or
 list of maps with the key as the question, the value as the output.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

message.description: String message to show when prompting.
message.title: Message

choices.description: Either a list of strings or dictionary .
choices.title: Choices

checked.description: Boolean if the default choices should all be checked.
checked.title: Checked

index.description: Boolean to return the index instead of the answer
index.title: Index
